title: In touch
creator_credit: George Brandt, Veronica Sherborne and University of Bristol
brief_description: This film shows how following directions, student teachers in the first part of the film demonstrate dance movement geared to achieving certain results with mentally retarded children. During the second part the students work with individual children. Throughout, maxims of educational psychology are demonstrated.
